front.title: IEEE Specification Format for Single-Degree-of-Freedom Spring-Restrained Rate Gyros

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This specification defines the requirements for a single-degree-of-freedom spring-restrained rate gyro for [aircraft, missile, spacecraft,______] applications. The rate gyro shall be capable of providing [(dc, ac) voltage outputs proportional to angular rate inputs up to______ degrees per second, a switch closure(s) at angular rates (exceeding,less than)______ (+,-,Â±)______ degrees per second].
